hanzi-su-wiki:
搬

Значения

Перевозить, перемещать, переносить

Мнемоника

Перемещать вручную 扌 или перевозить 般.
purpleculture_pinyin:
bān
to move (i.e. relocate oneself); to move (sth relatively heavy or bulky); to shift; to copy indiscriminately
переехать (т.е. переехать); двигаться (что-то относительно тяжелое или громоздкое); переключать; копировать без разбора
rtega_mnemonic:
搬搬RStransfer, transport, move, remove, shift
  • carried 般 by hand 扌
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 般 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
搬迁 [ bān qiān ]: to move; to relocate; removal
搬家 [ bān jiā ]: to move house; removal
照搬 [ zhào bān ]: to copy; to imitate
搬运 [ bān yùn ]: freight; transport; portage; to transport; to carry
搬用 [ bān yòng ]: to apply mechanically; to copy and use
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 般 [ bān ] sort, manner, kind, class
heisig_chinese_memo: A factory requires workers to sort things quickly with their fingers. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: conveyor, finger, fingers, carrier, boat, cruise missile, missile, wind, crotch
koohiiStory1: When workers neglect workplace safety, their fingers get cut off and carried away by the conveyor belt, which looks like a ´finger carrier´ in that case.
koohiiStory2: During WWII, morse code was the primary means of communication from sea. The morse code specialist was the conveyor of messages to and from the crew of the carrier, using his fingers to tap out the secret messages. (This works especially well for 搬送周波数 carrier frequency and 搬送波 carrier wave, being the radio waves/frequencies used in morse code).
jp_example_words: 運搬(うんぱん): transport, carriage
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: With your fingers you put some weapons in a boat for transport. This is a transport boat and its your job to get these weapons from one place to another.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine loading a bunch of weapons into a boat and sailing off to transport them somewhere else.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Hey! You're transporting weapons just like Han (はん) Solo! I mean, it was a spaceship, not technically a boat, but he definitely used the Millennium Falcon as a transport.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture yourself as a cool smuggler, transporting stolen... I mean... totally legitimate weapons from one place to another. Just like Han Solo!
Ru_Notes: Фонетик и не путать: 般 (ハン общность, всеобщность).
Ru_Radicals: 几 (стол), 又 (опять), 扎, 殳 (удар), 舟 (лодка)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a carrier (般) hand (扌) is a conveyor
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A factory requires workers to sort things quickly with their fingers. &nbsp If they can't carry on and don't sort quickly enough they will be relocated to a new factory with lower pay. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand " to " normal " sound, the original meaning is the position of the moving object. "Zhengzitong‧ Hand": "Move, scrab the word and emphasize the text. It is like a common pronunciation. It is used as a shifting word." Tang Luzhi "Winter Solstice Jiao Sacrifice Amnesty for the World": "Jiangxi and Hunan will be transported to Xiangzhou with 150,000 shi , Try to move to Shangdu to save the people from famine."

" Move " can mean migration. Song Zhangying "I want to live in Liangxi temporarily when I planted Chinese waxweed": "Move to the new path from the new path, and plant to the old church."

" Moving " can also mean provocation. Yuan Wuming's "Kill the Dog and Persuade Husband" 4th Discount: "Every day these two helpers are lazy, and my brothers who move are at odds."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hand " to the " normal " sound, the original meaning is the position of the moving object.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「般」聲，本義為移動物體的位置。《正字通‧手部》：「搬，搫字重文，今俗音般，作搬移字。」唐陸贄〈冬至郊祀大赦天下制〉：「江西湖南見運到襄州米一十五萬石，設法搬赴上都，以救百姓荒饉。」

　　「搬」可表示遷移。宋張鎡〈種蠟梅喜成時欲暫住梁溪〉：「搬處側從新徑裏，種時還向舊堂邊。」

　　「搬」也可以表示挑撥。元無名氏〈殺狗勸夫〉第4摺：「每日着這兩個幫閒鑽懶，搬的俺兄弟不和。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「般」聲，本義為移動物體的位置。

運搬(うんぱん): transport, carriage
從「 手 」，「 般 」聲，本義為移動物體的位置。《正字通‧手部》：「搬，搫字重文，今俗音般，作搬移字。」唐陸贄〈冬至郊祀大赦天下制〉：「江西湖南見運到襄州米一十五萬石，設法搬赴上都，以救百姓荒饉。」 「 搬 」可表示遷移。宋張鎡〈種蠟梅喜成時欲暫住梁溪〉：「搬處側從新徑裏，種時還向舊堂邊。」 「 搬 」也可以表示挑撥。元無名氏〈殺狗勸夫〉第4摺：「每日着這兩個幫閒鑽懶，搬的俺兄弟不和。」
From " hand" to " normal" sound, the original meaning is the position of the moving object. "Zhengzitong‧ Hand": "Move, scrab the word and emphasize the text. It is like a common pronunciation. It is used as a shifting word." Tang Luzhi "Winter Solstice Jiao Sacrifice Amnesty for the World": "Jiangxi and Hunan will be transported to Xiangzhou with 150,000 shi , Try to move to Shangdu to save the people from famine." " Move" can mean migration. Song Zhangying "I want to live in Liangxi temporarily when I planted Chinese waxweed": "Move to the new path from the new path, and plant to the old church." " Moving" can also mean provocation. Yuan Wuming's "Kill the Dog and Persuade Husband" 4th Discount: "Every day these two helpers are lazy, and my brothers who move are at odds."

Liushutong characters (3)

搬字的基本解释

搬
bān
移动，迁移：搬动。搬移。搬迁。搬运。生搬硬套。
挑拨离间：搬唆（调唆）。搬弄是非。

搬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bān］
［《字彙》音般］
亦作“搫2”。
(1)移动物体的位置，搬运。
(2)迁移，搬家。
(3)搬嘴，挑拨。
(4)扳。
(5)搬演。
(6)谓不根据具体情况，生硬移用。
(7)武术用语。

搬字的英文翻译

◎ 搬
take away, move, remove

搬字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　搬； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页448第03
搫字重文。　又【字彙】今俗音般。作搬移，搬演字。

搬字的源字形

搬字的起名意思

意指移动物体的位置，迁移等含义。

[①]［bān］
["Words" sounds like]
Also known as "Pick 2".
(1) Move the position of the object and carry it.
(2) Relocation, moving.
(3) Move your mouth and provoke.
(4) Pull.
(5) Rehearsal.
(6) It is said that it is not used according to the specific situation.
(7) Martial arts terms.

Зная слово.
Конгю (рука), его древние иероглифы похожи на руки, что означает перемещать и переносить предметы руками; Конг - это оригинальное слово для перемещения, как ручной шест, что означает катание на лодке и перенос; звук.
Первоначальное значение - движение и миграция.

2 Передача: в соответствии с ~ "raw ~ жестким".

двигаться
бан
двигаться
двигаться
писец
NL ル 9D
bān
1) переезжать, переселяться, менять квартиру
大家都搬到上海去了 все переехали в Шанхай
2) передвигать, перевозить, переставлять; переносить
搬凳子 переставить скамейку
搬起石头 поднять камень
把东西都搬到炕上去перенести все вещи на кан
把小说里的故事搬到舞台上 переносить сюжет романа на сцену, инсценировать роман
3) подговаривать, подстрекать; поднимать, вызывать
搬救兵 вызывать подкрепления
4) подражать, перенимать, копировать
生搬硬套 слепо подражать готовому образцу
搬教条 механически перенимать догмы
5) заработать много денег
今天是展览会的第一天，他搬了不少钱 сегодня первый день выставки, он заработал немало денег
Radicals: 扌, 舟, 殳  (fingers, boat, weapon)
Meaning Mnemonic
With your fingers you put some weapons in a boat for transport. This is a transport boat and its your job to get these weapons from one place to another.
Imagine loading a bunch of weapons into a boat and sailing off to transport them somewhere else.
Reading Mnemonic
Hey! You're transporting weapons just like Han (はん) Solo! I mean, it was a spaceship, not technically a boat, but he definitely used the Millennium Falcon as a transport.
Picture yourself as a cool smuggler, transporting stolen... I mean... totally legitimate weapons from one place to another. Just like Han Solo!
